readable.title: 247618600_239eeac405
readable.content: A girl has placed a purple cloth over her face while she lies on wooden structure . A girl is sunning herself with a purple towel over her face . A girl lays on a wooden deck with a piece of clothing covering her face . A young woman is laying in the sun with her face covered by a purple scarf . A young woman with a purple cloth hiding her face relaxes on a wooden deck .
